title: [Large-Scale] Iterative Instructional Design Process for Creative Mathematical Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematics and foundational problem-solving skills in mathematical contexts
context.additional_context: Iterative problem-solving cycle learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will creatively solve complex mathematical problems encountered in real-world tasks through an iterative design cycle (problem analysis–idea generation–implementation–evaluation).
Learners will identify obstacles encountered during mathematical problem-solving and propose at least three alternative approaches to overcome them.
Learners will visualize mathematical problems using digital tools and complete the process of data-driven decision-making with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
